title: Surrounded (2014)
storyline: A day in the life of a teacher after her husband leaves for a one day trip for business. She is pregnant and is left alone in their isolated house at the countryside. She begins to feel invisible presences, which frighten her all night. Who are they and can she survive until the next day?
plot: After witnessing his mother's murder at a young age, Kim Ji-yong (Lee Seung-gi) became a detective in order to investigate his mother's death. He later changed his name to Eun Dae-gu to be unnoticed by his mother's killer. On his way, he reunites with Eo Soo-sun (Go Ara), whom attended the same middle school and gradually develops a romantic relationship. At the same time, he spies on his team leader, Seo Pan-seok (Cha Seung-won), believing that he is related to the killer of his mother's case. As he unravels the truth behind the incident 11 years ago, he learns about his past, identity as well as making deep connections with people around him.
